001/**
002 * Class Item - Represents an object that can be placed in a Room.
003 * Each Item has a name, a description, and a weight.
004 *
005 * @author Florian NELCHA
006 */
007public class Item
008{
009    // ### Attributes ###
010
011    private String aName;
012    private String aDesc;
013    private double aWeight;
014
015    // ### Constructor ###
016    
017    /**
018     * Constructs a new Item with the specified name, description, and weight.
019     * 
020     * @param pName The name of the item.
021     * @param pDesc A detailed description of the item.
022     * @param pWeight The weight of the item.
023     */
024    public Item(final String pName, final String pDesc, final double pWeight)
025    {
026        this.aName = pName;
027        this.aDesc = pDesc;
028        this.aWeight = pWeight;
029    } // Item()
030    
031    // ### Getters ###
032    
033    /**
034     * Gets the name of the item.
035     * 
036     * @return The name of the item.
037     */
038    public String getName() 
039    {
040        return this.aName;
041    } // getName() 
042    
043    /**
044     * Gets the description of the item.
045     * 
046     * @return The description of the item.
047     */
048    public String getDescription() 
049    {
050        return this.aDesc;
051    } // getDescription() 
052    
053    /**
054     * Gets the weight of the item.
055     * 
056     * @return The weight of the item.
057     */
058    public double getWeight()
059    {
060        return this.aWeight;
061    } // getWeight()
062    
063    /**
064     * Returns a detailed string description of the item, including its weight.
065     * 
066     * @return A formatted string describing the item.
067     */
068    public String getItemString()
069    {
070        return "This is " + this.aDesc + " (Weight: " + this.aWeight + ")";
071    } // getItemString()
072}
